title: Remote SEO Specialist (Website Optimization & Keyword Ranking)
job_overview:
Job Title:
Remote SEO Specialist (Website Optimization & Keyword Ranking)

Job Description:
We’re looking for a talented and data-driven SEO Specialist to join us remotely and take charge of our website’s organic growth. Your primary mission: help us rank #1 for high-value keywords and dominate search engine results. If you thrive in a remote setup, love solving SEO challenges, and know how to make websites perform, we want you on our team.

Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct in-depth keyword research and competitor benchmarking to identify ranking gaps.

- Optimize on-page SEO: titles, headers, content structure, URLs, meta tags, and images.

- Develop and implement off-page SEO strategies including link building and outreach.

- Perform technical SEO audits and implement fixes (site speed, crawl errors, mobile usability, etc.).

- Monitor and report on search performance metrics using tools like Google Analytics and Search Console.

- Collaborate remotely with content writers and developers to ensure SEO alignment.

- Stay updated on search engine algorithm changes and adjust strategies proactively.

- Drive continuous improvement to achieve and maintain top rankings for key terms.

Requirements:
- Minimum 2 years of experience in SEO with a proven record of ranking success.

- Proficient in SEO tools: Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, Google Search Console, etc.

- Solid understanding of technical SEO, link-building strategies, and content optimization.

- Familiar with website platforms like WordPress, Shopify, and/or WIX.

- Strong communication, time management, and independent work ethic.

- Comfortable working fully remote with flexible hours.


To Apply:
Drop us a message, with the subject line ' SEO Specialist - WIX is red ' and a quick intro. Nothing formal — just tell us what you can do and we will proceed from there!
